name: lEaping for monEy
description:
How to Play:
Press E to go to level select
Hover your mouse over a level and press E to select the level
Hold E to move forward
Release E to ground pound and jump

Credits:
Character sprite made with Create Mixer by Kenney. 
Other art made using Piskel.
Made with the Phaser 3 Game Framework and Tiled Map Editor by Thorbjorn.

Notes:
Each time you hit the edge of the screen, you change directions and get a jump boost for 1 jump.
You are able to move forward in midair.
All levels are possible.
